title: Multiplayer Siege Weapons by Neongho
description: This is a catapult project working in networking. https://youtu.be/UGn5-1XiUY4  Video of usage part 1 single player Video of usage part 2 multi player   https://youtu.be/bbIkAwFgjW0
longDescription:
This is a product of the Creative Oven Studios developement group.

It is supposed to be a siege base framework, in shape of ancient age catapult.


Videos of the project:

Part 1 catapult single player

https://youtu.be/UGn5-1XiUY4

Part 2 catapult multi player

https://youtu.be/bbIkAwFgjW0


Use it however you want.

IMPORTANT* The controls are the following ones.


1: Peess keyboard E and stick close: to catapult to get in.

2: Press keyboard ASWD: to move forward backwards left and right.

3: Move mouse X Y : Move camera.

4: Press mouse left click: Start charging the catapult to shoot rock.

5: Release mouse left click before press: Shoot rock.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Catapults fully working!
  •  Catapult projectile fully working!

Number of Blueprints: 50+

Input:

1: Peess keyboard E and stick close: to catapult to get in.

2: Press keyboard ASWD: to move forward backwards left and right.

3: Move mouse X Y : Move camera.

4: Press mouse left click: Start charging the catapult to shoot rock.

5: Release mouse left click before press: Shoot rock.


Videos of the project:

Part 1 catapult single player

https://youtu.be/UGn5-1XiUY4

Part 2 catapult multi player

https://youtu.be/bbIkAwFgjW0


Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Linux Mac Windows

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: 3 main classes SiegeCharacter SiegeMaxPar and BallMaxPar and these handle everything.

Important/Additional Notes: Made mainly in ue4 but it can work in ue5 with couple fixes, unless the 5.0 version is there already.
